name: Synth Street
description:
Synth Street is a 2D retro arcade shooter.  Shoot and dash through enemies to rack up your score and survive for as long as you can! If the road gets too crowded, take to the skies and defeat enemies in style with vast aerial mobility and slow motion; just make sure you land back on your ride!

Controls:

WASD: Move

Mouse: Aim

Left Mouse Button: Fire

Right Mouse Button (in air): Bullet Time

Scroll: Change Ammo

Space: Jump

E (in air): Air Dash
